content: houndstooth stitch after blocking down to a us 10 6mm for the ribbing your finished size will be approx 78 wingspan x 36 deep along spine your needles gauge will measure approx 13 sts/15 row over 4 needles listed are suggested gauge needle us 10 6mm 32 circu- lar needles optional us 10 5 6 5mm or needle one size larger than gauge needle for bind-off 1 abbreviations directions for shawl garter tab shawl body mosaic pattern with color a co 3 sts follow text below or refer to charts shawl body right knit 6 row do not turn side and shawl body left side on pages 5 & 6 rotate 90° and pick up 3 sts 1 st in each of the garter ridge bumps along the side do not turn row 1 rs with color a k3 sm m1l k1 sl1 k1 rotate 90° and pick up 3 sts in each cast-on st 9 sts turn sl3 to 3 sts before m k1 sl1 k1 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k1 sl1 k1 sl3 to 3 sts before m k1 sl1 k1 set-up ws k3 pm p1 pm p1 pm p1 pm k3 m1r sm k3 row 2 ws with color a k3 sm p1 p1 sl1 p1 sl3 to 4 sts before m p1 sl1 p2 sm p1 sm p1 p1 sl1 establish mosaic pattern p1 sl3 to 4 sts before m p1 sl1 p2 sm k3 row 3 with color b k3 sm m1l k1 sl1 k5 to 4 sts follow text below or refer to chart set-up chart to estab- before m sl1 k3 m1r sm sl1 sm m1l k3 sl1 k5 lish mosaic pattern on page 4 to 2 sts before m sl1 k1 m1r sm k3 row 4 with color b k3 sm p2 sl1 p5 to 5 sts before row 1 rs with color b k3 sm m1l k1 m1r sm m sl1 p4 sm sl1 sm p4 sl1 p5 to 3 sts before m sl1wyib sm m1l k1 m1r sm k3 sl1 p2 sm k3 row 2 ws with color b k3 sm p3 sm sl1wyif row 5 with color a k3 sm m1l k1 sl1 k5 to m sm p3 sm k3 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k5 sl1 to 1 st before m k1 note from here on out we will not specify slipping with m1r sm k3 yarn in front or back remember slip wyib on rs row row 6 with color a k3 sm p2 sl1 p5 to 1 st before and slip wyif on ws row m p1 sm p1 sm p1 p5 sl1 to 2 sts before m p2 row 3 rs with color a k3 sm m1l k1 sl1 k1 sm k3 m1r sm k1 sm m1l k1 sl1 k1 m1r sm k3 row 7 with color b k3 sm m1l k3 sl3 to 3 sts row 4 ws with color a
